PARA O SUPORTE DIRECT 3D:

INCLUI HALF-LIFE.

[EN]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Click in "Install.bat" and wait the extraction. Choose by the bits of you computer.
Continue the extraction in the Cry of Fear folder, click in "Setup.bat" and wait.
(The extraction can be slow, depending of your computer)

2. Click in the options who works in your pc:
*Cry of Fear - D3D - NONSTEAM
(To run in medium computers, light effects not work in this version)

*Cry of Fear - GL - NONSTEAM
(To computers with a good RAM and support to OpenGL)


3. Optional. Change the game resolution in the following path:
*CryOfFear/CoFLaunchApp.exe
**If you choose higer resolutions who you pc not support, 
the game will not work in the first time, and he will come in the lowest resolution.

TO SUPPORT TO DIRECT3D:
When the game start, he will be freeze, when this occour,
press "Alt" and "Tab" in the same time to go in your Desktop,
go in the game error menssage and click in "Yes" and click to open the game.

TO COMPUTERS WITH OPENGL, BUT CAN'T PLAY:
If the game comes with OpenGL error (such like others GoldSRC games),
open the "Half-Life.bat" file and go to "Options" and "Video",
defore, select the OpenGL driver and apply, exit the game and open Cry of Fear.

INCLUDES HALF-LIFE.
